code: @Override @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     super.setUp().     prepareFtpServer(). }

@Test public void testSkipDotFiles() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedMessageCount(2).     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("Reports", "Reports").     mock.assertIsSatisfied(). }

private void prepareFtpServer() throws Exception {     // prepares the FTP Server by creating files on the server that we want to unit     // test that we can pool and store as a local file     sendFile(getFtpUrl(), "Hello World", ".skipme").     sendFile(getFtpUrl(), "Reports", "report1.txt").     sendFile(getFtpUrl(), "Bye World", ".camel").     sendFile(getFtpUrl(), "Reports", "report2.txt"). }
public void configure() throws Exception {     from(getFtpUrl()).to("mock:result"). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from(getFtpUrl()).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
